text: Ni ngankuŵaga (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) m’masengo galigose, soni ngankusoomaga mwalakwemo chilichose cha m’Qur’an, soni (jenumanja achinaŵandu) ngankupanganyaga masengo galigose, ikaŵeje Uwwe tukuŵaga Mboni pa jenumanja ndema jankujijilika nago, soni ngachikasasisika kwa Ambuje ŵenu (chindu) chausito wanti mpela lunyilili pasi kapena kwinani, soni namuno chamwana nnope kupunda chalakwecho kapena chakulilapo niikaŵeje chili m’chitabu chakusalichisya (chilichose Al-Lauh-Al-Mahfûz)
